title: Something that always makes me die a little inside
body:
Looking at those badass Mordekaiser splashes in the loading screen...
https://d1u5p3l4wpay3k.cloudfront.net/lolesports_gamepedia_en/b/b9/Mordekaiser_3.jpg https://lolskinshop.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/MordekaiserLoadScreen_5.png

And then seeing how they actually look in game

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bk7yfljNRPY/WYC7G_Gu7_I/AAAAAAAAqf4/DWiS8JwRzSYqDhigI4MA7OeK_lJA1aP-gCLcBGAs/s1600/morde.png
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-A5Q5Y2XSy-4/VUFuGXs7gbI/AAAAAAAApDo/jaTmqz9DAZM/s1600/mordeturn.jpg


Really goes to show how much I just love the "idea" of Mordekaiser.
He looks like an indestructible titan in his splashes, making you think he'd be this towering colossus in game that's extremely durable and just walks over the opposition.
And then we get this tin can with weird proportions and a kit that's all over the place.


This shows really well WHY Morde needs a VGU, he has a solid character idea and an endearing champion fantasy, but he just does NOT deliver on it.

Now excuse me while I touch myself inappropriately to this Aatrox teaser.

I am utterly amazed by his dedication to this game and his favorite champion, and my distaste whenever i used to see a MM post has since turned into loathing, because I have never been this dedicated with my main.

I give this guy a ton of credit, because you're not the first nor the last to call him out, and yet he still does it.

Don't get so angry at someone thats obviously very passionate, its just hateful and meaningless.
They're meant to invite discussion and give ideas to Riot for what people want for his eventual rework (when they finally get around to it).  No need for toxicity, friend.
